website_summaries.verdict: A premium low-back ergonomic stool that is crafted from high-end materials and sold at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Features black vinyl upholstery that is both durable and stylish
Includes dual wheel casters for added mobility
Offers pneumatic seat height adjustment for unmatched flexibility
Provides a terrific addition to a doctor's office, classroom, or workshop
cons: Seat may be too small for some adults
Sockets that hold the casters in place sometimes break due to extended use

customer_reviews.title: Seat height adjustment
customer_reviews.text: While the seat appears to be well made and functional for the purpose it was purchased, I think the products specifications could be a bit clearer. The information on this seat indicates the height adjustment is 24 1/2 to 28 1/2 inches. This measurement is from the top of the raised bar backrest. The actual seat height adjustment is approximately 20 to 24 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I knew I would like it but it was not pretty enough for my very feminine self. So, I spent $10 on paint and fabric to doll it up for my office. It rolls smoothly, was easy to assemble, and the envy of co-workers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Handy, handy stool. Bought it to use while suffering disc problem. Little did I know how useful this would be. Use it as a vehicle for transporting heavy or clumsy objects around house. It maneuvers splendidly, adjusts up and down with great ease, even rolls on and off carpets with minimal effort. And, finally, has given hours of enjoyment to grandsons (teen and tween) who love wheeling around at top speed......debated buying another so they could race!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS STOOL!!! I have been searching for a stool (for years!) that I could use while cooking. I am disabled and can only stand for a few minutes at a time, but I love to cook. All the other stools were too short, too tall, too hard to move around, too heavy... This stool has adjustable height, swivel seat, is SMOOTH rolling, and is very light weight. It was also a breeze to assemble. I couldn't have asked for a more perfect stool! It's also great for haircuts, styling hair, doing artwork, or any number of other projects.
customer_reviews.author: GMAX215

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these in 2014; one for the kitchen and one for the laundry room. I can stand or walk for very short periods of time, so had given up cooking and doing laundry. These stools made cooking and doing laundry possible again. I love them. One caution: do not get up and try to sit back down again without looking and holding on to the handle - it wheels very freely, and you will end up on the floor! I just ordered one for a friend who has had to give up cooking for the same reason I had. She'll love it, I'm sure!
customer_reviews.author: Genine Franklin-clark

customer_reviews.title: As a Massage Therapist...
customer_reviews.text: As a massage therapist the handle and lite-weight, fact that it rolls on padded carpet, compact wheel base and generally intelligent design features are great. If you are shorter (I'm 6'3") you might comsider a shorter minimum height (even lowest sitting setting is borderline too tall). Solid, very easy to assemble. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for the money, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this was the simplest thing I have assembled all year. Four screws (factory treated with thread locker) is all that needed a tool (A Philips screw driver). Everything else snaps into place. The finished product is very sturdy and looks great, and it took less than 10 min. to assemble. Five legs and casters makes it more stable than the four legged models. Another bonus is that it's made in Taiwan not Red China. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Antos

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I think this little stool saved my life! While I was waiting to qualify for Medicare so I could have my arthritic hip replaced, I found it increasingly difficult to stand while cooking or cleaning.This little gem made it possible for me to manage daily tasks. It is tall enough that I could reach the stove and the sink, but the adjustable height also made it short enough to reach down and pick up something dropped on the floor. It rolls easily, is stable and I feel secure when using it. An excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: Costuming junkie

customer_reviews.title: Best value- great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought some 10 years ago. They are heavily used in the office. Two of the 5 have broken in yr 10 so needed replacement but the others are going strong. Bought a few different designs elsewhere and they are failing within 2 yrs. These are the stools to get!
customer_reviews.author: J Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Use with Caution!
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with balance and have to be very careful using this chair. It does come in handy in the kitchen and for doing chores like folding laundry and cooking, but one does have to be careful not to fall off of it. After a period of time has gone by, I just had a bad fall with this chair yesterday 5/12/16. If you are disabled, make another choice and don't buy this one. It went out from the back when I was putting stockings on my feet, and I fell very hard on my spine.
customer_reviews.author: dollcostumer

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTWEIGHT & STRONG! 19” to 24” Seat Height
customer_reviews.text: A well-made easy-to-assemble chair with simple ONE page visual instructions. I was skepticsl to spend too much on a small stool, but you really get what you pay for—worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: QueenAmazon

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it, I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it, I LOVE IT! The assembly is such a piece of cake. I'm not a handy person but I was able to assemble it with ease. The wheels roll freely and easily around the house and it's sturdy enough for me. The handle is handy to pull where you want it. The cushion has added comfort on my rear. The height is perfect for me too! All in all, this product is so perfect for me. I strongly believe that it can hold up to 250 lbs because my nephew is around 200 sat on it and nothing happened to it. All in all, I am very pleased with my purchase. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Positive review pending receiving word back from sellers
customer_reviews.text: Seat upholstery has a rip in it upon arrival and Unboxing... Called seller and will leave at one star until I hear back... Other than that, the seat looks like it’s what I hoped it would be, practical, small but sturdy, good quality other then upholstery cut
customer_reviews.author: Nols

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Smooth running and easy to assemble. Wish it sat a little higher, but it’s doable
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy this stool
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stool ever! I really love it, it rolls with ease on my carpet. Easy to assemble, literally took me 4 minutes. For the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Sewing and Craft Stool
customer_reviews.text: I put this stool together is less than 10 minutes. The wheels roll very well, it is stable and when I stand from my sewing machine it moves out of my way easily. It rolls well on my area rug and wood floors. The height is adjustable so I can use it at several different craft tables and projects around the house. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not only for Workshops but of Kitchens too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands workshop, he loved the stool. When we remodeled our kitchen he brought it inside to set on. After our new island was put in we founded that we like the stool for that too! I plan on buying two more for the kitchen. I had knee replacement and can use it to eat at bar or to cook!
customer_reviews.author: Dogwood

customer_reviews.title: this is so good!! helped my posture greatly
customer_reviews.text: this is so good !! helped my posture greatly. I have it at my office, and my home office too. bought few more give away to my co workers. they all love it..
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part.  Part D.
customer_reviews.text: The order is missing the part D. Frustrating. Hopefully I can get it or else it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair. It is comfortable and moves freely. I use it in my woodworking shop. I have had it a couple months. It looks good, is comfortable and is stable to sit on. The only negative thing I might say is that it moves on its wheels really freely. A little touch and it scoots away and one might miss it when sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and it glides like a zephyr
customer_reviews.text: I cook. I also have major back problems and standing on my feet longer than 10 minutes is impossible. This well-made little rolling stool has changed all that. It was easy to assemble and it glides like a zephyr. Great price, too
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lowe

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect stool! I use it in the kitchen for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect stool! I use it in the kitchen for getting around preparing meals, since I can't stand very long at a time this is extremely helpful. It doesn't take up much space and rolls around beautifully! I am so pleased I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pupose
customer_reviews.text: Got this to take to craft fairs as it is lightweight and comfortable. Got to use it for one show then my father appropriated it for his computer desk. He says it is perfect for him and slides right under the desk when not in use freeing up floor space. Don't think I'm getting it back.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Seat height is only 20-24", not 28.5"
customer_reviews.text: Color me angry. Great stool, sturdy and rolls well. However, the item description says it goes up to 28 1/2 inches. I needed a high stool, so I bought this one. But 28.5" is the height of the metal bar backrest, not your bum. The stool seat height is only 20-24".
customer_reviews.author: Kerton

customer_reviews.title: Rolling in Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool to replace one supplied by an employer. I am a hygienist and this stool allows me to get close to my patient and rolls well over the carpet in the schools. I will use it at my desk at home when not on a work site. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: rivergirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this stool. No back rest, so no slouching. Fairly low and stores under table well. Swivels easily.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair for my husband for his work shop or "man cave" as we call it. He loves it! He said assembly was easy, it's comfortable, looks nice, and has a lower back support. It wheels nicely back and forth between table set ups. Excellent chair!
customer_reviews.author: William M. Vogelsong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For my tiny office!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable,simple to put together, I'm very pleased. Chrome parts sturdy, plastic leg piece fell off, made me anxious about its longevity. Fits beautifully in my small workspace, good looking,; I love it's comfort and e.asy mobility in tight quarters - incredibly better than an office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, convenient and smooth working stool!
customer_reviews.text: A great stool/tool to help me get around and do chores with with my bad back - so glad we found this one!
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: nice chair, it rolls well and is stable on five legs. I use it for my wood shop and it rolls over chips and sawdust fine. everything seems solid so I would recommend it. it is a bit short for say a drafting table or woodworkers bench but I carve wood at a regular height desk kind of thing I rigged up so.
customer_reviews.author: david a leach

customer_reviews.title: I actually like these better than the conventional office chairs because they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and use them as chairs at two PC desks. I actually like these better than the conventional office chairs because they swivel easily but don't take up a lot of space. The grandkids and great grandkids love them, too, since they twirl round and round.
customer_reviews.author: ATV Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for his use
customer_reviews.text: This stool has really been a great addition to hubby's shop. He loves the height adjustment, rolling from one area to another. The back bar does help to remind him to keep back in proper position while working on projects. Well built machine for the $$
customer_reviews.author: retired reader

customer_reviews.title: Better than crutches.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Recovering from foot surgery. Adjustable height. It allows me to whip around the kitchen to prepare meals. Beats crutches. May keep using it even after I recover. Wheels are stiff at first but with use the stool glides with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Judith From Maryland

customer_reviews.title: It's brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could be so motivated to give 5 stars to a stool. It arrived super fast. It was incredibly easy to assemble. I mean, really, it's the easiest assembly ever. It's comfortable and solid. And, a great price. I could not possibly be more happy.
customer_reviews.author: Interested Reader

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for a bad back
customer_reviews.text: I have back problems that make it hard for me to stand for any length of time. I bought one of these for the kitchen - what a lifesaver. I wheel around, can sit on this while I reach the bottom shelves of the refrigerator. It makes cooking projects possible. So I bought one for my bathroom, and then my sewing room. I'll probably order one for my studio next. I am close to 300 lbs, and these seem to handle my weight just fine. I love the little handle on the back, which makes it easy for my to grab and get into position.
customer_reviews.author: aerlys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and layed out the parts. Four steps to follow and I was done. All I needed was screwdriver and four screws that were included in the box. I recommended this product. Same height as my wooden stool. I love it and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: got this for my mother in law. she praises ...
customer_reviews.text: got this for my mother in law. she praises it often as it has been so helpful in her kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: bill lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Fits my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Fits my purpose - wish it had a stopper for the wheels - and maybe a little higher would be best, but I get backaches at the kitchen counter if I'm standing and this works well for a moderate price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice Fit and Finish Welds appear Solid Smooth Rolling and Elevator Piston Simple Back Rail is Nice Feature
customer_reviews.author: Just a Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy Roller
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to put together, rolls easily and now I've got a high enough sewing chair and can switch between machines without getting up. Love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: J Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good Stool
customer_reviews.text: Great Stool, very clear directions on assembly, ten to twenty minutes at most. But not quite as comfortable as the ergonomic stool also sold by Flash furniture.
customer_reviews.author: artquinn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love. Comfortable and a great chair for my sewing room. Sturdy, rolls well on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jane duerr

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this in the kitchen. Easy to assemble (all of 5 Minutes), comfy seat to roll from one counter to another while cooking. Shopped and shopped, this is the best. Nice to have handle to roll it out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Rita P.

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping that the seat would be more comfortable so that I could sit for a longer period ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that the seat would be more comfortable so that I could sit for a longer period of time than I could with my previous chair, but that is not the case. I do like its mobility and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Chacon-Larson

customer_reviews.title: I cannot stand for long periods of time, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stand for long periods of time, I use this stool in my kitchen to get around. I just wish it went up a little bit higher...
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Glad we took the chance
customer_reviews.text: Needed a stool for home use. Liked the idea of the "bar" on the back, makes it easier to pull/push around when not sitting in it. Was concerned that it was not as expensive as many wheeled stools, but it was a nice surprise to find that it was not as "cheap" as expected. Just got the other day and husband had to assemble it for us, but we expect it to suit our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Haring

customer_reviews.title: great little stool/seat
customer_reviews.text: great little stool/seat. I was in need of small seat for the office. I have a lot of people at work coming by to discuss work issues and this was perfect so they can actually have a seat.
customer_reviews.author: 20th Century Arber

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems of good construction and it rolls around my workshop like a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a stool, at 170 lbs I do not put too much pressure on it; and it supports me well. Everything seems of good construction and it rolls around my workshop like a boss.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Simply works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have hip pain when bearing weight. This stool is perfect solution to move around in the kitchen with ease and comfort. The package has damage but luckily nothing inside is affected.
customer_reviews.author: Ting Ting

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for my computer desk...
customer_reviews.text: It came in a flat box and I thought, YIKES!!! But it was so easy to assemble even though no assembly instructions were included. If you're not handy with tools, ask a "handy" friend to help... it was together in minutes and I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this stool
customer_reviews.text: Love this stool...have had it for 2 years and I use it all over the house for my projects where I need to have a temporary seat as well as in the kitchen for my baking projects.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingGrlOH

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I imagined it would be. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I imagined it would be...it is well below the barstool height I was anticipating. This was my fault, I should have paid more attention before ordering. This is a lightweight small compact stool, not a full size workbench stool.
customer_reviews.author: Doc1

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair. I use it in the kitchen. I have MS and can't stand for long periods of time, but I love cooking/baking.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this little stool
customer_reviews.text: Love this little stool. It moves easily, and turns easily on carpeting. I use it at my card table when I do zigsaw puzzles, and it fits beneath the table when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Marie M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Handy in the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my kitchen so that I can sit while whipping up recipes. Lifesaver for me because I have a bad back.
customer_reviews.author: New York Woman

customer_reviews.title: Light Duty Only
customer_reviews.text: This stool is probably fine for the home or office, but would not survive a workshop or garage environment as stated in description. The wheels are lightweight plastic. Concrete floors would chew the wheels up. Amazon customer service is excellent, as they refunded my money and arranged for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: KG1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4", 115 lbs, and my desk is in tight quarters. This stool is perfect - moves easily, doesnt tip, adequate construction, not super soft but good enough to me, can adjust easily to keep my back feeling painfree, and allows me to sit correctly at my taller than normal desk. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Terlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great stool! Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great stool! Very comfy. Forces you to sit in a proper position. Well made. Plastic wheels ok for inside use. Use this for home office.No back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Our admin assistant loves her stool. It rolls VERY easily so use caution when using! But just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Pediatric nurse

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but slightly utilitarian. Much better than any other option I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: BobN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine in the kitchen for someone like me with back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic find!
customer_reviews.text: I got one for in the kitchen when I really get into cooking. With a bad hip, it helps me when I need it. My husband fell in love with the idea and wanted one for his bench in his workshop. Of course, I got him one also. We are both happy now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta A. Cardiff

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilled a great need!
customer_reviews.text: My wife needs this in the kitchen. She has painful arthritis especially in her legs. This stool allows her to be mobile in the kitchen and continue her love of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Clawson

customer_reviews.title: It's not what I anticipated, does not reach the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not what I anticipated, does not reach the height of my counter in the kitchen, but rolls around very well. I use it for a chef chair.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: A handy stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool was easy to assemble. It is light weight and stable enough considering it is on rollers. The compact size keeps it out of the way in a crowded work area.
customer_reviews.author: David T Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stool! Love the small footprint and the handle to pull it around by. Easy assembly too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fast
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife in her art studio, she moves all around the room, going from project to project. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JR44

customer_reviews.title: Flash Furniture WL-ST-08-GG Ergonomic Stool
customer_reviews.text: light compact chair that stores easily when not in use. yet is very durable to handle my weight sliding from one end of my work bench to the other
customer_reviews.author: gary l benschoter

customer_reviews.title: This chair is an excellent one for a person with knee problems can negotiate ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is an excellent one for a person with knee problems can negotiate his works both pre and post surgery. Lightweight yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shreimer

customer_reviews.title: More than Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase. The size of the seat is smaller than other chair and I love it. Also, very very well made. Made in Taiwan.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable, like sitting on a rock.
customer_reviews.text: It is not real comfortable, I added two inches of dense foam and reupholstered it and it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't do without the stool
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad back. So I ordered the stool to use in the kitchen as well for so of my yard work. I should of purchased years ago. The stool is not just for the Doctor's office.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline A Faber

customer_reviews.title: The seat is not very cushioned which is fine with me
customer_reviews.text: The seat is not very cushioned which is fine with me. Sturdy, been using for months at the office and it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Flo K

customer_reviews.title: Great work stool
customer_reviews.text: The only con I have is that I am 6'6", so it could have been a little taller. Otherwise, it is an ideal design for my garage workspace.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: for my husband, who has balance issues. this ...
customer_reviews.text: for my husband, who has balance issues. this lets him scoot around the house without fear of falling. works well.
customer_reviews.author: rocknsteady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for his workstation and it's perfect for him to play his keyboard and drum machine. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: HowzitUSA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and rolls around the kitchen very smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as specified. Easy to assemble and rolls around the kitchen very smoothly. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Kane

customer_reviews.title: The 5 castors make rolling around easy, construction feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was incredibly quick. The 5 castors make rolling around easy, construction feels sturdy, I'm not feeling worried about tipping when rolling. I'll let ya know if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Perfect for my small computer desk
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Perfect for my small computer desk. Sturdy, well built, and arrived ahead of schedule
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Have it in my kitchen and use it all the time. Rolls easy and easy to adjust height.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great and useful product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stool... This is a great product. Very comfortable and adjustable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Cormane

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I broke my foot, so bought this to roll around my kitchen. Well built, stable, good price, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kent

customer_reviews.title: Love the stool
customer_reviews.text: Love the stool, I thought it was higher but I could have use a little bit higher but it is good for maybe for shorter people.
customer_reviews.author: ree brown

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH AND WORKS GREAT THANKS
customer_reviews.text: TRULY A GOD SEND, REALLY HELPS ME WHEN I HAVE TO STAND LONG PERIODS OF TIME.
customer_reviews.author: butch2006

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stool approx. 5 weeks ago to increase my mobility due to a broken ankle. It has performed perfectly and it is very well constructed and stable. I would highly recommend it, and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Nemitz

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Is sturdy and nice looking. Haven't had it for more than a couple weeks but wish it had the option to lock the wheels. So far it seems like a good chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: This stool is so nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: This stool is so nice and compact. It moves very smoothly. I use this as my stool at the salon while I'm cutting hair and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I use it all the time for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, good casters
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, sturdy, good casters, solid construction. Exactly what I was looking for in a basic stool.
customer_reviews.author: Titus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. The height adjustment makes it very versatile
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Flamini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stool for the money .. function and space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stool, Great Help
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool for my wife. She has MS and tires quickly when she does housework, cooking, etc. She absolutely loves this stool and has only had it a few days. But she cooks, does dishes, even mops the floor on this thing. She had to quit her career because of the MS and she enjoys and insists on doing housework and such. This stool has enabled her to do more than she could before without as much pain in her hips or tiring as quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Skuterbum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This chair is solid, comfortable, does not tip over, and I use it in the kitchen at the highest setting, and at my desk at it's lowest.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy M. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second because I liked the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Verdant

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen stool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to rest and read while I wait for things to cook - works wonderfully well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good chair. fits under desk for more room area.
customer_reviews.author: sellingnelly

customer_reviews.title: Seat too small for adults
customer_reviews.text: The seat is tiny and very uncomfortable. It is also unsafe because you can easily slide off the seat. My DOCTOR told me to buy a new chair because this one was giving me large bruises on my rear end because the seat was too small and I had to fight to stay on the chair. A metal seat back is also very uncomfortable. The only purpose I see for it is that is reminds you not to slide of the back.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stool for a small fishing boat! Take the casters off, very stable, back support, seat turns, adjustable height!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great office chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice office chair that glides easily, does not take up too much room, and is very comfortable. The slight back is nice to have for those moments when you lean back after forgetting you are sitting in a backless chair as it is just enough to catch you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Doctors use this a lot, they know what they are buying!
customer_reviews.text: so easy to assemble. Fits under the desk, moves easy between two rooms, has the "handle" , some back support.
customer_reviews.author: Jan van Dam

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Ergonomic Stool
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThis stool is practical for any fast-paced environment. This stool features a uniquely designed raised bar back. The small frame design of a backless stool makes it easy to maneuver around tight spaces with ease. This stool can be used in a multitude of settings including the classroom, doctor's office, hospital, garage or a workshop.
